definition: to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

containing_words.word: 中苏解决悬案大纲协定

sentences.english: And so Sarai took it upon herself to solve God’s problem.
sentences.chinese: 撒莱在自己解决神的问题。

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解决了计量史学的危机。

sentences.english: Problems, if any, should be solved without delay.
To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解决措施为采用氩弧焊，改进焊接结构设计等。

sentences.english: Fourth, solve problems through consultation on an equal footing, instead of imposing restriction at will.
sentences.chinese: 通过平等协商解决问题，不要动辄设限和制裁。

sentences.english: NorthStar, the first name in heavy-duty encoders, has the solution.
sentences.chinese: 北极星，在重型编码器的名字，有解决方案。

sentences.english: I want players to enjoy the 'aha!' of solving a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望玩家能享受解决一个谜题后“啊哈”的感觉。

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 彻底解决了防风抗滑问题，保住重大设备不受损失。

sentences.english: Strike was over, but problem existed stilly .
sentences.chinese: 罢工虽然解决了，但问题依然存在。

sentences.english: How do you cope when your brain locks up?
sentences.chinese: 当脑子突然抽住的时候，你会如何解决呢？

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不关注森林，那么气候变化问题就是无法解决的。

sentences.english: The objective of RMC is to provide a comprehensive process solution for the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: RMC的目标是为企业提供一个完整的过程解决方案。

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解决供需矛盾可从两个方面着手，首先是减少需求。

sentences.english: Fourth, solving the energy supply problem in rural areas through the establishment of fuel woods.
sentences.chinese: 四是通过营造薪炭林，解决农村能源问题。

sentences.english: and they also have a greater capacity to address their emissions than developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 他们也比发展中国家更有能力解决排放能力。

sentences.english: Sneaking out may seem like a real option in the heat of anger.
sentences.chinese: 盛怒之下，偷偷溜出去看上去似乎是真正的解决之道。

definition: to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
lit. the fire burns one's eyebrows (idiom); fig. desperate situation/extreme emergency
